lessonGuidance: Safe tiles are tiles that do not contain mines.
When you are sure a hidden tile is safe, you can reveal the tile by simply left-clicking it.
This action will reveal the tile if it is a numbered tile. If it is an empty tile, all empty tiles will be revealed in its group.
You should only ever reveal a tile if you are 100% sure it is safe, or in a 50/50 case, which will be discussed in a later lesson
